title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: crewel wool on cotton
Technique: Uncounted stitches chain stitch [done with a needle] and knots and satin stitch on a 2/2 twill foundation.
description: Piece of crewel embroidery colored yarns with scattered motifs in a grid arrangement.  The motifs do not repeat in a regular manner but alternate a florral motif [8 different ones, sometmes facing in different directions] with an animal or bird motif [8 different ones]   Different colors are used when a motif is repeated.
name: Fragment
